description:
Sync or back up your folders on your Windows PC or Mac for easy access anytime, anywhere


Fixed issues
- Fixed an issue where computer drives and folders were not displayed correctly when setting up backups with an external optical drive connected.
Windows
- Fixed an issue where setting up sync or backups on computer drives using the exFAT file system or external drives could prevent modified files from syncing or backing up properly.
macOS
- Fixed an issue that could prevent BeeStation for desktop from launching.
- Fixed an issue where a prompt regarding 'com.synology.BeeStation.OpenAtLogin.sh' might appear when launching BeeStation for desktop.
